data.name: Digital Marketing
data.about:
Digital Marketing is a integral of everyone life everyone of us is 
surrounded by digital marketing by some way or other , 
nowadays we carrying a full fledged market in our pockets. Lets 
understand how you can turn customers through digital 
marketing .
People spend twice as much time online. And while we say it a 
lot, the way people shop and buy really has changed, meaning 
offline marketing isn’t as effective as it used to be.
Marketing has always been about connecting with your audience 
in the right place and at the right time. Today, that means that 
you need to meet them where they are already spending time: on 
the internet.

data.name: Internet of Things
data.about: Get expertise in Internet Of Things and dive in the practical aspects of learning. The workshop has no prerequisites and you get to interact and learn the experience of Internet Of Things from scratch. Enhance your knowledge in coding, get into the smart world and build your own smart devices.

data.name: Tall Buildings and Structures
data.about: IGNUS, the Annual Techno-Cultural festival of Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur brings to you a great opportunity to learn the practical aspects of tall buildings. Explore the various techniques in designing and analysis of a tall building and build it yourself with a perfect guidance.

data.name: Sixth Sense Robotics
data.about:
Sixth sense technology is a revolutionary technology that can change the physical world around us and make it more simpler.

This course introduces you to the amazing world of sixth sense technology and its fascinating applications. Using an Arduino board and other electronic components, you will develop a robot that can be controlled through digital information. The digital information is processed using the image processing technique which takes the input data from the user who can give commands using hand gestures.

Apart from gaining practical skills on Sixth Sense technology, you will learn about the Arduino Architecture, Arduino Programming, Image Processing technology by doing this project based course.
